snippet.title: Red Dead Redemption - Full Game Walkthrough in 4K
snippet.description:
Red Dead Redemption Full Movie Walkthrough / Guide video in Hardcore Difficulty - 4K Ultra HD [Played on Xbox One X - Enhanced Version]

Rockstar Games Walkthrough Videos Playlist: https://bit.ly/2RP61Bl

► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos
► INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/GTASeriesNews
► FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GTASeriesNews
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GTASeries
► DISCORD: https://discord.gg/GTASeries

NEW AUSTIN CHAPTER:
0:00 Mission #1 - Introduction - Exodus in America
13:30 Mission #2 - New Friends, Old Problems
24:51 Mission #3 - Obstacles in Our Path
30:07 Mission #4 - This is Armadillo, USA
35:40 Mission #5 - Women and Cattle
43:41 Mission #6 - Wild Horses, Tamed Passions
59:11 Mission #7 - A Tempest Looms
1:06:33 Mission #8 - Political Realities in Armadillo
1:16:30 Mission #9 - Justice in Pike's Basin
1:30:25 Mission #10 - Old Swindler Blues
1:34:43 Mission #11 - Spare the Rod, Spoil the Bandit
1:50:30 Mission #12 - The Burning
1:58:13 Mission #13 - Hanging Bonnie MacFarlane
2:12:49 Mission #14 - You Shall Not Give False Testimony, Except for Profit
2:24:32 Mission #15 - Exhuming and Other Fine Hobbies
2:36:47 Mission #16 - A Gentle Drive With Friends
2:43:47 Mission #17 - Let the Dead Bury Their Dead
2:53:07 Mission #18 - Liars, Cheats and Other Proud Americans
3:06:16 Mission #19 - A Frenchman, a Welshman and an Irishman
3:12:58 Mission #20 - Man is Born Unto Trouble
3:28:07 Mission #21 - On Shaky's Ground
3:41:32 Mission #22 - Can a Swindler Change His Spots?
3:51:49 Mission #23 - The Sport of Kings, and Liars
4:00:56 Mission #24 - The Assault on Fort Mercer
4:14:47 Mission #25 - We Shall Be Together in Paradise

NUEVO PARAISO CHAPTER:
4:33:57 Mission #26 - Civilization, at Any Price
4:52:58 Mission #27 - The Demon Drink
5:04:55 Mission #28 - Empty Promises
5:21:07 Mission #29 - Mexican Caesar
5:40:11 Mission #30 - The Gunslingers Tragedy
5:51:47 Mission #31 - Landon Ricketts Rides Again
6:06:46 Mission #32 - Lucky in Love
6:14:25 Mission #33 - The Mexican Wagon Train
6:25:01 Mission #34 - My Sister's Keeper
6:32:02 Mission #35 - Must a Savior Die?
6:42:22 Mission #36 - Cowards Die Many Times
6:53:36 Mission #37 - Father Abraham
7:06:50 Mission #38 - Captain De Santa's Downfall
7:18:09 Mission #39 - The Great Mexican Train Robbery
7:34:55 Mission #40 - The Gates of El Presidio
7:55:57 Mission #41 - An Appointed Time

WEST ELIZABETH CHAPTER:
8:11:23 Mission #42 - Bear One Another's Burdens
8:31:15 Mission #43 - Great Men Are Not Always Wise
8:44:53 Mission #44 - At Home With Dutch
9:03:22 Mission #45 - For Purely Scientific Purposes
9:13:04 Mission #46 - The Prodigal Son Returns (To Yale)
9:22:35 Mission #47 - And You Will Know the Truth
9:32:14 Mission #48 - And the Truth Will Set You Free

MARSTON RANCH CHAPTER:
9:53:31 Mission #49 - The Outlaw's Return
10:10:23 Mission #50 - Pestilence
10:15:34 Mission #51 - Old Friends, New Problems
10:26:02 Mission #52 - By Sweat and Toil
10:34:01 Mission #53 - A Continual Feast
10:42:52 Mission #54 - John Marston and Son
10:55:19 Mission #55 - Wolves, Dogs and Sons
11:04:05 Mission #56 - Spare the Love, Spoil the Child
11:11:23 Mission #57 - The Last Enemy That Shall Be Destroyed

EPILOGUE:
11:28:03 Mission #58 - Remember My Family
11:36:05 End Credits

#RedDeadRedemption #RockstarGames #GTASeriesVideos

ABOUT US

GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.

Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.

ABOUT RED DEAD REDEMPTION

America, early 1900's. The era of the cowboy is coming to an end.

When federal agents threaten his family, former outlaw John Marston is sent across the American frontier to help bring the rule of law. Experience intense gun battles, dramatic train robberies, bounty hunting and duels during a time of violent change.

Red Dead Redemption is an epic battle for survival in a beautiful open world as John Marston struggles to bury his blood-stained past, one man at a time.
